title: Musical Alarm
comment: If you like to wake up to music, this is the perfect alarm app. Unfortunately it doesn't work with the newer version of Google Music (because Google broke playlist functionality) but it still works perfectly with Pandora and it's not too difficult to find older versions of Google Music. It's very straightforward and works quite well.
